name: StacKlash2Untap
description:
Welcome to the StacKlash2Untap Deck Converter, an online deck editor that can download or upload StacKlash decks as .txt files for easier searching/deck editing!

Filtering searches: Scroll on the words at the top to look through their drop-down menus. Check the boxes & type in the text to search for cards.

Adding cards: Left-click on the cards in the results section (the one with the black background to add them to your deck.

Removing cards: Left-click on the cards in the deck to remove them.

Reading cards: Right-click on any card to see its info. Continue right-clicking to scroll through the info.

Click the ? for help.
